title: (x) Who digitised Wim Crouwel's New Alphabet? - The Foundry {Pieter}
content:
Can anyone point me to the foundry that is digitizing Wim Crouwells typefaces.  
I read about it a few months ago but can’t find anything at the mo. I’m looking for  
Wims pivotal ’New’ typeface.

Thanks  
javi

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314161544im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/WIM.gif)

 [‹ Help ID this Wedding Monogram script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314161544/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18264 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) NewVision Clinics logo - Futura {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314161544/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18260 "Go to next forum topic")
author: javi2307

comments.content:
Thanks Pieter.  
Like your type/cake btw :)
